news.txt: Python 3.6 is installed. Pour activer python3 : # scl enable rh-python36 bash

brusel and muhka are reinstalled and back in the cluster. To send jobs on these nodes, please only once execute the following script to allow the nodes to access your home directory : # /share/programs/scripts/add_ssh_keys_external_nodes.sh
